segments.text: The moment feels so still, yet everything is teetering on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the soft light coming through the window illuminating the chaos in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the brewing storm inside shocks me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m almost mesmerized by the sight of water flowing over the sink—it’s beautiful in a chaotic way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that beauty is fleeting; every second, the puddle grows larger, threatening to spill more troubles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and it’s frustrating to watch her not see the dangers beneath her own feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step into the drawing, to pull her aside and say, 'Look!'
segments.speaker: PAR
